short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for My Gift IQ that allows you to save the url in your Gift IQ Profile!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for My Gift IQ that allows you to save any URL in your Gift IQ Profile!  Great for those things you see on line that you want added to your Gift IQ Profile as a gift idea for yourself.  Now you don't even have to go to our site to add your favorite items!
